data.work_description:
Constructed the user interfaces and algorithms for searching the profile directory pages.
Reinforced front-end code with back-end solutions in order to modernize the display.

Automated software testing to improve efficiency by over 600%, saving over $54,000 a year.
Graphically displayed test results, highlighting potential bottlenecks and areas of low efficiency.
Updated the User GUI from a Flash interface to HTML5, Java, and JavaScript.

Funded a startup company with a crowdsale smart contract using two custom crypto tokens.
Developed a crypto voting system, allowing crowdsale participants to vote on relevant issues.
Invented a Utility Token that served as the backbone of the entire company.
Tested all functionalities through secure Unit Testing and uploaded to DApp web application
Fun projects I worked on at home in my free time.
Challenging projects I worked on for class at University of Texas at Austin.
